Localization.Title: This Way or That?
Localization.Text: "Kindness and forgiveness, masters!" the Creature gurgles and prostrates before you. "Masters looking for...Baggins? Orcses go to hill of haunted stones, with slavses. Orcses take Baggins too, precious. But Sméagol knows trail in woods. Find orcses and Baggins, we can. Follow Sméagol to find Baggins?” Should you follow the trail of the Orc caravan, or will you trust this strange Creature, Sméagol?
